name: Spaceman Escape
description:
This is my project 5 for CAS 117 at Michigan State University

I have modified my 3D platformer to be different from the tutorial.

1.Updated "About" page

2.New game title "Spaceman Escape"

3.Changed background colors and button colors for menu's

3.Revamped level 2

4.Unique music for the menu and each level

5.Created a Level 3

6.Changed enemies health on different levels

Credits:

Created by Andrew Jamison

Michigan State University
